## quatToMat44 variable

Converts quaternion into 4x4 matrix with optional translation offset `t`<!-- -->, then writes result to `out`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
quatToMat44: (out: import("@thi.ng/vectors").Vec | null, a: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, t?: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>) => import("@thi.ng/vectors").Vec
```
